== Ubuntu Translations Training ==

You would like to translate Ubuntu into your mother tongue, but you don't know how translations work in Ubuntu or how to use Launchpad?

Hop in in one of our translations training session, we will guide you through all that is necessary to get your work done!

=== Upcoming Sessions ===

We'll be running translations sessions every two weeks in the `#ubuntu-translators` channel on Freenode.

The next translations training session will be on:
* 3rd February 2011 -- 16:00UTC

=== Resources ===

* <nowiki>[[Suggestions|Training Suggestions]]</nowiki> - leave ideas or suggestions for our next sessions
* <nowiki>[[Logs|Previous Sessions]]</nowiki> - check out our previous translations sessions
